# Solution
t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))

    # if we can sort the array, then we can swap the adjacent elements in p
    # if we can swap the adjacent elements in p, then we can sort the array
    a.sort()
    for i in range(m - 1):
        if p[i] + 1 == p[i + 1]:
            a[p[i]], a[p[i] + 1] = a[p[i] + 1], a[p[i]]
    print("YES" if all(a[i] <= a[i + 1] for i in range(n - 1)) else "NO")

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
c = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()
b.sort()
c.sort()
s = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(n):
        if b[i] > c[j]:
            s += 1
print(s)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = set()
    for j in range(m):
    # print(s)
        s.add(p[j] - 1)
    for j in range(n - 1):
        if j in s:
            if a[j] > a[j + 1]:
                a[j], a[j + 1] = a[j + 1], a[j]
    s = True
    for j in range(n - 1):
        if a[j] > a[j + 1]:
            s = False
            break
    if s:
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")



# Solution
t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = [*map(int, input().split())]
    p = [*map(int, input().split())]

    # if we can sort the array, then we can only swap the adjacent elements
    # but we can swap them any number of times
    # so we can sort the array in 2 steps:
    # 1. sort the array
    # 2. swap the adjacent elements in p
    # if we can sort the array, then we can swap the adjacent elements in p
    # if we can swap the adjacent elements in p, then we can sort the array
    a.sort()
    for i in range(m - 1):
        if p[i] + 1 == p[i + 1]:
            a[p[i]], a[p[i] + 1] = a[p[i] + 1], a[p[i]]
    print("YES" if all(a[i] <= a[i + 1] for i in range(n - 1)) else "NO")

n = int(input())
m = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

# if we can sort the array, then we can only swap the adjacent elements
# but we can swap them any number of times
# so we can sort the array in 2 steps:
# 1. sort the array
# 2. swap the adjacent elements in p
# if we can sort the array, then we can swap the adjacent elements in p
# if we can swap the adjacent elements in p, then we can sort the array
a.sort()
for i in range(m - 1):
    if p[i] + 1 == p[i + 1]:
        a[p[i]], a[p[i] + 1] = a[p[i] + 1], a[p[i]]
print("YES" if all(a[i] <= a[i + 1] for i in range(n - 1)) else "NO")

for i in range(t):

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = set()
    for j in range(m):
        s.add(p[j] - 1)
    for j in range(n - 1):
        if j in s:
            if a[j] > a[j + 1]:
                a[j], a[j + 1] = a[j + 1], a[j]
    f = True
    for j in range(n - 1):
        if a[j] > a[j + 1]:
            f = False
            break
    if f:
        print("YES")
    else:
        print("NO")

t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))

    # if we can sort the array, then we can only swap the adjacent elements in p
    # but we can swap them any number of times
    # so we can sort the array in 2 steps: 1. sort the array, 2. swap the adjacent elements in p
    # if we can sort the array, then we can swap the adjacent elements in p
    # if we can swap the adjacent elements in p, then we can sort the array
    a.sort()
    for i in range(m - 1):
        if p[i] + 1 == p[i + 1]:
            a[p[i]], a[p[i] + 1] = a[p[i] + 1], a[p[i]]
    print("YES" if all(a[i] <= a[i + 1] for i in range(n - 1)) else "NO")

def is_sorted(array, m):
    s = set()
    for i in range(m):
        s.add(array[i] - 1)
    for i in range(n - 1):
        if i in s:
            if array[i] > array[i + 1]:
                array[i], array[i + 1] = array[i + 1], array[i]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        if array[i] > array[i + 1]:
            return False
    return True

    for i in range(m - 1):
        if p[i] + 1 == p[i + 1]:
            a[p[i]], a[p[i] + 1] = a[p[i] + 1], a[p[i]]
